statement: Determine all values \(x\) in the interval \(0 \leq x \leq 2\pi\) which satisfy \(2 \cos x \leq |\sqrt{1 + \sin 2x} - \sqrt{1 - \sin 2x}| \leq \sqrt{2}\).

Consider the \(3\times 3\) homogeneous linear system whose coefficient matrix has (a) positive diagonal entries, (b) negative off-diagonal entries, (c) positive row-sums. Prove that the only solution is the trivial one \(x_1 = x_2 = x_3 = 0\).

Tetrahedron \(ABCD\) has edge \(AB = a\) and edge \(CD = b\); the shortest distance between the skew lines \(AB\) and \(CD\) is \(d\) and the angle between them is \(\omega\). A plane \(\varepsilon\) parallel to both \(AB\) and \(CD\) divides the tetrahedron into two parts whose distances from \(AB\) and \(CD\) are in the ratio \(k\). Find the ratio of the volumes of the two resulting solids.
Find all sets of four real numbers \((x_1, x_2, x_3, x_4)\) such that the sum of any one of them and the product of the other three equals 2.

In acute-angled triangle \(OAB\), a point \(M \neq O\) moves (a) along side \(AB\), (b) throughout the interior. Perpendiculars from \(M\) to \(OA\) and \(OB\) meet them at \(P\) and \(Q\); \(H\) is the orthocenter of triangle \(OPQ\). Find the locus of \(H\) in each case.
Given \(n \geq 3\) points in the plane, each pair joined by a segment, let \(d\) be the length of the longest segment (a diameter). Prove that the number of diameters is at most \(n\).
